subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Davis Love III made a 12-foot birdie putt on the 18th hole for a 4-under-par 66 that gave him a share of the lead with Jim Furyk going into the final round of the McGladrey Classic.
snippet: Davis Love III made a 12-foot birdie putt on the 18th hole for a 4-under-par 66 that gave him a share of the lead with Jim Furyk going into the final round of the McGladrey Classic.
